name: 04.01 - Clear and Grub Stripping of Topsoil
template name: 04.01 - Clear and Grub Stripping of Topsoil

name: 1 - Clearing limit plan prepared and approved by Prinicpal with boundary limits clearly marked
2 - Any trees, shrubs and overhanging branches to be left undisturbed shall be clearly marked prior to clearing operations reaching the area concerned.

3 - Marketable timber shall be clearly marked by contractor Prior to clearing. Marked trees felled and handled avoiding damage to the trunks. The trunks trimmed and stacked in neat manageable stockpiles approved by the Administrator at spacings of not more than 500 metres.
4 - Material suitable for organic mulch shall be in accordance with MRTS16B Vegetation Ground Works
Acceptance Criteria & Frequency (Project Specific) - Visual, MRTS16B
5 - Hollow timber which is identified as being suitable for fauna habitat logs relocated to areas clear of construction activities
6 - Topsoil stripped as required in Cl 3.1 of Annexure MRTS.04.01. Depth of excavation shall be specified in the Cl 3.1 of Annexure MRTS04.01 or as directed.

7 - Surplus material and material considered not suitable for use as planting media in accordance with Cl 8.3 shall be assessed for suitability for use as fill or deemed as unsuitable and disposed of in accordance with Cl 11

8 - Material not removed from within drip lines of trees except where this would result in unsuitable material being left beneath embankments. Root systems of existing plants to be retainined are preserved where practical.
9 - Stripped material shall be stockpiled in the locations shown on the drawings, as stated in Clause 3.2 of Annexure MRTS04.1
○ Appropriately battered, drained or otherwise protected to prevent erosion and segregation
Acceptance Criteria & Frequency (Project Specific) - Max. Lot Size, Min. Testing Frequency, Min. No. of Tests
8 - Geometrics, Clearance Limits, Vertical (Stripping of Topsoil only)
Acceptance Criteria & Frequency (Project Specific) - 1000m, 1 test per 100m per side, 1 per lot
Project Manager Verify that the Above has been Constructed according to Specification
Client Verify that the Above has been Constructed according to Specification
